sense.name: a violently combustible chemical substance
sense.examples: These dogs are trained to sniff and detect explosives in baggage. The demolition crew placed explosives strategically throughout the building. TNT was an explosive that was used a lot during World War II.

sense.name: a type of linguistic stop articulation with a burst of air
sense.examples: Initial 'p' in English is an explosive stop, unlike 'p' that directly follows a sibilant, such as 's'.
